attributes.action: Make all Menstrual products free for every woman in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Because I believe this is really important part of woman’s health and they should not be forced to pay for something that they cannot control. 

I think everyone would agree that this would be a really great thing for taxpayers money to go towards, and would be instrumental to the poorer parts of this country allowing every woman, young, old, rich and poor, to look after their health and wellbeing.
attributes.background: Make Tampons, pads and other menstrual products free for all woman in the Uk

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Fund increased access to menstrual products to address period poverty 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710759
